\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w appointed|strong="G2525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*: wherefore \w it|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w would|strong="G0302"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w*: seeing \w that|strong="G3767"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w would|strong="G0302"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w example|strong="G5262"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*. \w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G4160"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w answered|strong="G5346"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w finish|strong="G2005"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*: \w See|strong="G3708"\w* (saith \w he|strong="G2532"\w*) \w that|strong="G3748"\w* thou \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* shewn thee \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w mount|strong="G3735"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w obtained|strong="G5177"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w ministry|strong="G3009"\w*, \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w how|strong="G3745"\w* \w much|strong="G3745"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* testament, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* established \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* former \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w faultless|strong="G0273"\w*, \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w should|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w finding|strong="G3201"\w* \w fault|strong="G3201"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith: \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* perfect unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* Juda, \w a|strong="G3708"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* testament:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* testament \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w lead|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* continued \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* testament: \w and|strong="G3962"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* regarded \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* testament \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w make|strong="G1303"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w my|strong="G1325"\w* \w laws|strong="G3551"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w write|strong="G1924"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1325"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* neighbour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Know|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w least|strong="G3398"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w greatest|strong="G3173"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w merciful|strong="G2436"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G0093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w remember|strong="G3403"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w made|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* former \w old|strong="G1095"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* decayeth \w and|strong="G2532"\w* groweth \w old|strong="G1095"\w*, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* its end.
